alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval County through 230 PM EDT... At 202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Caroline, or near Unf, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Unf, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Craig Field, San Pablo, Little Talbot Island and Fort Caroline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval
